title: “Tree of life”: how baobab seed-derived biochar could lead to water safety for underprivileged communities through heavy metal (Fe) removal – SDG 6
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00205A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Magdalena J. Mkelemi, Grite N. Mwaijengo, Mwemezi J. Rwiza
In many developing countries, including Tanzania, safe drinking water remains scarce due to poverty and environmental challenges. Affordable local water treatment methods e.g., use of baobab seed-derived biochar, are crucial for achieving SDG 6.
